channel.title: Killcounter
channel.description:
hi
can someone pls make me a killcounter i am looking for a tutorial for a long time now if you know how to make it or you know a tutorial pls post
thanks in advance
kevin

item.title: Killcounter
item.dc:creator: @judgechaos judgechaos
item.description:
@judgechaos wrote:

lol i get kill counters in my server to see how many kills u got on certain npc’s like jungle demons or tree spirits…maybe i can get the code for it =)

here is my kill counters but idk if its like wat u wanted…my kill counters is on top of the screen and u press the “change frame” on my Quest tab to change it from players jdem kills etc etc etc…

public void writeFrame() { if (skullTimer <= 0) { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); try { if (EnCh()) { sendFrame126("@blu@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@blu@ Heating: ", 6572); sendFrame126("@blu@"+GetItemName(SuperHeatMG), 6664); } else if (MageTP()) { sendFrame126("@blu@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@blu@ Points: ", 6572); sendFrame126("@blu@"+MageTP, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 1) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Task: "+GetNpcName(slayerTask), 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@"+slayerAmount, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 2) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Jungle Demons", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+dskim, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 3) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Blue Dragons", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+dmba, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 4) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Tyras Guards", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+dhal, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 5) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Tree Spirits", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+ddl, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 6) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Saradomin Mages", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+sara, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 7) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Guthix Mages", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+guth, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 8) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Zamorak Mages", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+zamy, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 9) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Elf Warriors", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+elfc, 6664); } else if (FrameSet == 10) { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Tzhaar Mini-Game", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@Kills: "+TzKills, 6664); } else { sendFrame126("@gre@ Chaos Scape", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+"", 6572); sendFrame126("@gre@", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); } } catch(Exception E) {} } }

Read full topic
